Articles.Content:
Hello Everybody,

I recently started playing Kerbal, 0.90 for a start. I had a difficult time figuring out how this game works, but many hours later i'm starting to understand the basics. Starting without SAS or manoever nodes was really hard! I actually downloaded 0.25 to understand the differences and found out it became a lot harder to play trough carreer. Anyway... I now know how to place sat's in orbit and I managed to rescue an orbitting kerbonaut! For me, it felt like the worlds greatest achievement. (LOL) I know it's not much, but that's why im here! Im hoping to learn a lot on this forum, this may be the next best thing after LEGO!

Greetings!

Well welcome to the forums Pringl3s.

(also, groeten terug)

Welcome aboard! Don't you worry, you'll get used to the game in pretty short order. Rescuing a Kerbal from orbit is definitely a tough challenge, and it looks like you've done that, so there really isn't much you can't do with a little ingenuity!

welcome to the forums and to KSP in general! Prepare to lose huge chunks of your life obsessing over specific impulse, thrust-to-weight ratio and interplanetary transfers

in all seriousness: welcome to the forums, if you have any questions, feel free to ask. You'll find this is a very helpful community full of people very willing to lend a friendly hand

(Also: groeten van uit BelgiÃƒÂ«)
welcome! What is your side in the green/ red iron crown war? (hint: Green)

welcome! What is your side in the green/ red iron crown war? (hint: Green)

C'mon now, let's keep this war off of the books for new forum users...

I have no idea of what you're talking about. I am playing now kerbal with my friends with the DarkMultiplayer mod on a server i've set up for it. This doubles the fun of failing!! We've set up a few space stations around Kerbin and the Mun, i really love this game and the game itself is getting more interesting by the day. Especially using parts in different ways is a big challenge. Would love to get more people to join on my server now and then, if you are interested send me a PM.
